prop.name: beforeMedia
prop.desc: A media object representing the circumstances before performing this direction.

prop.name: prepTime
prop.desc: The length of time it takes to prepare the items to be used in instructions or a direction, in ISO 8601 duration format.

prop.name: tool
prop.desc: A sub property of instrument. An object used (but not consumed) when performing instructions or a direction.

prop.name: performTime
prop.desc: The length of time it takes to perform instructions or a direction (not including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.

prop.name: totalTime
prop.desc: The total time required to perform instructions or a direction (including time to prepare the supplies), in ISO 8601 duration format.

prop.name: supply
prop.desc: A sub-property of instrument. A supply consumed when performing instructions or a direction.

prop.name: afterMedia
prop.desc: A media object representing the circumstances after performing this direction.

prop.name: duringMedia
prop.desc: A media object representing the circumstances while performing this direction.

ListItem.name: nextItem
ListItem.desc: A link to the ListItem that follows the current one.

ListItem.name: position
ListItem.desc: The position of an item in a series or sequence of items.

ListItem.name: previousItem
ListItem.desc: A link to the ListItem that preceeds the current one.

ListItem.name: item
ListItem.desc: An entity represented by an entry in a list or data feed (e.g. an 'artist' in a list of 'artists')’.
